name: Groundhog Downhill
description:
Winter is nearly over, the groundhogs are coming out. While there's still snow, they love nothing more than a downhill contest!

Gameplay is simple: Guide your furry friend down the slopes to the finish line.

Try beating the one minute mark! 50 seconds is really good, my personal best is 45.5.

There is a downloadable version for Windows, too - it's exactly the same game as in the browser.

If this brought a few minutes of joy into your day, consider making a donation. It'll help me making more fun games!

I've used the following audio assets under CC 3.0 license:

"Flying Disco Loop" by SergeQuadrado https://freesound.org/people/SergeQuadrado/sounds/511413/

"Roll.wav" by DrMrSir https://freesound.org/people/DrMrSir/sounds/529563/
